altername_name: Marie-Antoinette y la Guerra de Independencia de los Estados Unidos: Episodio 1: La Hermandad del Lobo
name: Marie-Antoinette and the American War of Independence: Episode 1: The Brotherhood of the Wolf
overview: Game in 5 languages ! (English, Spanish, German, Italian, French) From Yorktown to Versailles, live through an incredible adventure with more than 10 hours of gameplay accompanied by Washington, La Fayette, Benjamin Franklin, Rochambeau, Fersen… An encyclopedia about the 18th century, the American War of Independence, Versailles… Numerous mini-games (Pharaoh, battle frigates, Trou Madame…) and a great many riddles will put your skills and your wisdom to the test…”
